docTitle.titlePart:
Uplink Closed Loop Transmit
Diversity for HSPA

byline.docAuthor: Yibo Jiang, Haitong Sun, Sharad Sambhwani, Jilei Hou

front.div:
Abstract
The closed loop transmit diversity scheme is a promising technique to improve the uplink
transmission performance in HSPA. This paper provides an introduction to the
motivation and theoretical analysis of a closed loop transmit diversity (CLTD)
beamforming scheme for the HSPA system. Details are also provided on the algorithm
description, the user equipment and Node B transmitter/receiver implementation and the
corresponding system performance.
